verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> concerning the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: concerning the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H6549>Pharaoh-neco<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which was by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> in <S%H3751>Carchemish<s%>, which <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
Prepare <S%H6186><s%> ye the <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H6793>shield<s%>, and draw <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

Harness <S%H631><s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and get <S%H5927>up<s%>, ye <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and stand <S%H3320>forth<s%> with your <S%H3553>helmets<s%>; <S%H4838>furbish<s%> the <S%H7420>spears<s%>, put <S%H3847>on<s%> the coats of <S%H5630>mail<s%>.

Wherefore have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2844>it<s%>? they are dismayed and are <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>; and their mighty <S%H1368>ones<s%> are beaten <S%H3807>down<s%>, and are <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4498>apace<s%>, and look not <S%H6437>back<s%>: <S%H4032>terror<s%> is on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Let not the <S%H7031>swift<s%> flee <S%H5127>away<s%>, nor the mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%>; in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> have they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen<s%>.
Who is this that riseth <S%H5927>up<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile<s%>, whose <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1607>toss<s%> themselves like the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>?

Egypt <S%H4714><s%> riseth <S%H5927>up<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile<s%>, and his <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1607>toss<s%> themselves like the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>: and he <S%H559>saith<s%>, I will rise <S%H5927>up<s%>, I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427>thereof<s%>.

Go <S%H5927>up<s%>, ye <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and <S%H1984>rage<s%>, ye <S%H7393>chariots<s%>; and let the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%>: <S%H3568>Cush<s%> and <S%H6316>Put<s%>, that <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%>; and the <S%H3866>Ludim<s%>, that <S%H8610>handle<s%> and <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%>.

For that day is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5360>vengeance<s%>, that he may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> him of his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>: and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> and be <S%H7646>satiate<s%>, and shall <S%H7301>drink<s%> its fill of their <S%H1818>blood<s%>; for the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, hath a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6875>balm<s%>, O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: in <S%H7723>vain<s%> dost thou use <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7499>medicines<s%>; there is no healing for <S%H8585>thee<s%>.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of thy <S%H7036>shame<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is full of thy <S%H6682>cry<s%>; for the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> hath <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together<s%>.

The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, how that <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> should <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Declare <S%H5046><s%> ye in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H4024>Migdol<s%>, and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> and in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes<s%>: <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3320>ye<s%>, Stand forth, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H2719>thee<s%>; for the sword hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> round about <S%H5439>thee<s%>.
Why are thy <S%H47>strong<s%> ones swept <S%H5502>away<s%>? they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3068>not<s%>, because Jehovah did drive <S%H1920>them<s%>.

He made <S%H7235>many<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble<s%>, <S%H5307>yea<s%>, they fell <S%H376>one<s%> upon <S%H7453>another<s%>: and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, and let us go <S%H7725>again<s%> to our own <S%H5971>people<s%>, and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of our <S%H4138>nativity<s%>, <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
They <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H6547>there<s%>, Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is but a <S%H7588>noise<s%>; he hath let the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> time pass <S%H5674>by<s%>.

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, surely like <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> among the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and like <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, so shall he <S%H935>come<s%>.

O thou <S%H1323>daughter<s%> that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H6213>furnish<s%> thyself to go into <S%H3627>captivity<s%>; for <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> shall become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, and shall be <S%H3341>burnt<s%> <S%H3427>up<s%>, without inhabitant.
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is a very <S%H3304>fair<s%> <S%H5697>heifer<s%>; but <S%H7171>destruction<s%> <S%H935>out<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, it is come.

Also her hired <S%H7916>men<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her are like <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H4770>stall<s%>; for they also are turned <S%H6437>back<s%>, they are fled <S%H5127>away<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, they did not <S%H5975>stand<s%>: for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H6256>them<s%>, the time of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%>.

The <S%H6963>sound<s%> thereof shall <S%H3212>go<s%> like the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; for they shall <S%H3212>march<s%> with an <S%H2428>army<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> against her with <S%H7134>axes<s%>, as <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>.

They shall cut <S%H3772>down<s%> her <S%H3293>forest<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, though it cannot be <S%H2713>searched<s%>; because they are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H697>locusts<s%>, and are <S%H369>innumerable<s%>.

The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be put to <S%H3001>shame<s%>; she shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%>: <S%H6485>Behold<s%>, I will punish <S%H527>Amon<s%> of <S%H4996>No<s%>, and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, with her <S%H430>gods<s%>, and her <S%H4428>kings<s%>; even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and them that trust in <S%H982>him<s%>:

and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>lives<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> it shall be <S%H7931>inhabited<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

But <S%H3372>fear<s%> not <S%H3290>thou<s%>, O Jacob my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3467>for<s%>, lo, I will save thee from <S%H7350>afar<s%>, and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity<s%>; and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and shall be <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and at <S%H7599>ease<s%>, and none shall make him <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H3290>thou<s%>, O Jacob my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for I am with <S%H6213>thee<s%>: for I will make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whither I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H6213>thee<s%>; but I will not make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of <S%H3256>thee<s%>, but I will correct thee in <S%H4941>measure<s%>, and will in no <S%H5352>wise<s%> leave thee <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>.
